data.name: Cowravaneer
data.detailed_description:
You are a simple office clerk. You hate your job. Your colleagues are idiots. Your boss is a tyrant. You pay off loans at frantic interest on a second-hand crumbling car and a new fancy phone. And occasionally you suffer from insomnia.
All you are dreaming about right now is to end this damn day as soon as possible and get some sleep. And everything would have gone according to plan, if not for a noisy party at the neighbors' ...
LET THEM DIE !!!

- Advanced artificial intelligence.
- Stealth system.
- Watch your enemies, study their behavior, and come up with sophisticated ways to kill them, and go unnoticed.
- Search every corner of every room in search of items that will help you kill all these annoying people.
- Build the deadliest traps and kill as many people as possible before the cops find you.
data.about_the_game:
You are a simple office clerk. You hate your job. Your colleagues are idiots. Your boss is a tyrant. You pay off loans at frantic interest on a second-hand crumbling car and a new fancy phone. And occasionally you suffer from insomnia.

data.short_description: Not a Good Day - is a first-person action game about an ordinary person having not a good day. And he decided to make this day not so good for everyone who gets in the way of his quiet life.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
